element.label: GenderItem
element.definition: Details about the gender of an individual.
element.comment:
PREFACE:
‘Gender identity’ and ‘Sex assigned at birth’ were included in DDR1 but have been further clarified in Phase 2 discussions with clinicians. In fact, Release 1’s ‘Birth sex’ has been updated and renamed to ‘Sex assigned at birth.

element.label: SexAssignedAtBirth
element.definition: The sex of the individual, determined by anatomical characteristics observed and registered at birth.

element.label: GenderIdentity
element.definition: Identification of gender, usually self described.

element.label: LastUpdated
element.definition: The date this gender item was last updated.

element.label: CountryBirthItem
element.definition: The country in which an individual was born.

element.label: CountryBirth
element.definition: The country in which an individual was born.

element.label: DateArrival
element.definition: The date an individual, born outside of Australia, first arrived in Australia with the intent of long term residence.

element.label: CulturalEthnicIdentityItem
element.definition: Details about identification with a geographic, social and cultural group by the individual.

element.label: CulturalEthnicIdentity
element.definition: Identification of a cultural and ethnic group by the individual, usually self-described.
